home.heroSubtitle: Every tool you need to be productive, in one place. Process videos, images, PDFs and more. 100% Free and Open Source.
home.videoToolsDesc: Compress, convert and process your video files with ease. Supports MP4, AVI, MKV and more.
home.imageToolsDesc: Optimize your images. Compress JPG, PNG, WEBP or convert between formats instantly.
home.pdfToolsDesc: Complete PDF solution. Merge, split, compress, organize and manage your PDF documents.
home.regexTesterDesc: Test and debug your regular expressions in real-time with visual highlighting.
home.unitConverterDesc: Convert between thousands of units. Length, weight, temperature, speed and more.
home.compressVideoDesc: Quickly reduce video file size without losing quality.
home.organizePdfDesc: Rearrange, delete or rotate pages in your PDF files.
home.convertImageDesc: Transform images to PNG, JPG, WEBP formats in seconds.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: TaskPlex is a powerful, modern, and open-source utility suite for processing Videos, Images, and PDFs.
